name: @modernlogic/react-native-geocoder
description: react native geocoding and reverse geocoding

scripts.dev:try: function trydev { VERSION=`jq .version -r < package.json`; SRC=`pwd`; test -f $1/package.json || return -1; npm run tar && rm ~/.yarn/berry/cache/@modernlogic-* && (cd $1; rm ..vendor/@modernlogic/snap*; cp $SRC/package.tgz ./vendor/@modernlogic/snap_$VERSION.tgz; yarn remove @modernlogic/snap; yarn add ./vendor/@modernlogic/snap_$VERSION.tgz) } && trydev
scripts.tar: npm run build && mkdir -p package && cp -r dist package && cp package.json package && cp README.md package && cp -r android package && cp -r ios package && cp -r react-native-geocoder.podspec package && tar -czf react-native-geocoder@$(jq -r .version < package.json).tgz package && rm -rf package
